EmailTemplate.name: Exam Results Day Email: Not Matched
EmailTemplate.subject: Good Luck From Step Forward
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good luck!
Hi, We wish you the best of luck on exam results day here at Step Forward. We hope it went well. Please be aware that we are still organising interviews throughout August and we are working to get the right employer for you. Best wishes!
Step Forward
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM
